title: elizaos Eliza (2025-01-14)
overview: Development focused on package improvements (missing @elizaos/plugin-b2), new features (Gitcoin passport), 5 bug fixes. with 34 contributors merging 10 PRs. Major work included shakkernerd is currently working on merging pull requests related to fixing issues with plugins and optimizing recent interactions queries.

fixes: IME causes multiple messages on Enter (Fixes #2272)

issues_summary: working on 5 bugs including 'Chat Input Sends Multiple Messages When Using IME', 'the tweets are getting cutoff... where can i adjust the tweet length?' and implementing 2 feature requests including 'Trying to find how to run Eliza locally with two graphical cards. ', 'feat: add ntf-starter and nft-generator'
